attributes.action: ensure that every single item of cargo and luggage entering the uk by sea and air is searched.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Drugs, guns, knives and other illegal items enter the UK in vast quantities everyday. Not enough is intercepted. How hard can it be to scan and search EVERYTHING entering the UK? This would solve gun crime and drug problems almost overnight. The benefits to the economy would mean it would easily pay for itself. It would also make the UK much safer from terrorism. Invest in proper security at ports and airports now.
